goal.ch: This course introduces students to the recent empirical strategies employed for causal inference. At the end of the course, students are expected to be able to start your own empirical research on topics of public policy implications.
goal.en: This course introduces students to the recent empirical strategies employed for causal inference. At the end of the course, students are expected to be able to start your own empirical research on topics of public policy implications.

outline.ch: Selection Bias, Propensity Score Matching, Instrumental Variable, Difference-in-Differences, Regression Discontinuity
outline.en: Selection Bias, Propensity Score Matching, Instrumental Variable, Difference-in-Differences, Regression Discontinuity

textbook.ch:
Angrist, J. and J.S. Pischke (2014), Mastering 'Metrics: The Path from Cause to Effect, Princeton University Press.

Angrist, J. and J.S. Pischke (2009), Mostly Harmless Econometrics, Princeton University Press.
textbook.en:
Angrist, J. and J.S. Pischke (2014), Mastering 'Metrics: The Path from Cause to Effect, Princeton University Press.

Angrist, J. and J.S. Pischke (2009), Mostly Harmless Econometrics, Princeton University Press.

gradMethod.ch:
1. Two Paper Presentations (20% + 20%)
2. Term paper presentation (20%)
3. Term paper (40%)
gradMethod.en:
1. Two Paper Presentations (20% + 20%)
2. Term paper presentation (20%)
3. Term paper (40%)

officeHour.ch: Wednesday 1:00 p.m. ~2:00 p.m. or by appointment.
officeHour.en: Wednesday 1:00 p.m. ~2:00 p.m. or by appointment.

flexDiscription.ch: 本課程採取16周課程設計，剩餘兩周將依照期末報告進度彈性使用。
flexDiscription.en: 本課程採取16周課程設計，剩餘兩周將依照期末報告進度彈性使用。
